head.title: Maven project support for Oxygen Developer

body.h2: Maven project support for Oxygen Developer
body.p: This plugin allows to support Maven projects, with a package view of directories. This plugin adds a Maven Project view, that allows project navigation, files openning, file creation, where directory structures are displayed as packages.
It adds support for dependency:/ protocol, presented at XML Prague 2018. It adds a context-menu in @href attributes, to find dependency resources in all declared Maven dependencies.
1.02.00 release adds a compressed view of package names, if they are longer than 25 characters. It also corrects a bug where files were created at a wrong location when in a package.
